oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RPPC Sevierville 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Caption on back: ‘Bob cat Abel kilt at Sevirville.’ Shows man and two children sitting on automobile running board, man holding dead bob cat. [1912]. 1 p RPPC (Real photo postcard).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Group portraits; Children; Dead animals; Automobiles;
